Judul: BLACK-BOX QUANTUM STATE PREPARATION WITHOUT ARITHMETIC
Abstrak:
Black-box quantum state preparation is an important subroutine in many quantum algorithms. The
standard approach requires the quantum computer to do arithmetic, which is a key contributor to the
complexity. Here we present a new algorithm that avoids arithmetic.We thereby reduce the number of gates
by a factor of 286–374 over the best prior work for realistic precision; the improvement factor increases
with the precision. As quantum state preparation is a crucial subroutine in many approaches to simulating
physics on a quantum computer, our new method brings useful quantum simulation closer to reality.
Fakultas: Fakultas Matematika dan Ilmu Pengetahuan Alam
Sumber: PHYSICAL REVIEW LETTERS 122, 020502 (2019); © 2019 American Physical Society
